header.author: Zaihua Ji, zji@ucar.edu
header.description: table of web online data file information

column.name: wid
column.comment: auto generated web file id in table wfile, internal use

column.name: wfile
column.comment: file name under web data home directory

column.name: uid
column.comment: user.uid who archived the file

column.name: data_size
column.comment: number of bytes

column.name: date_created
column.comment: date file created

column.name: time_created
column.comment: time file created

column.name: date_modified
column.comment: date file last modified

column.name: time_modified
column.comment: time file last modified

column.name: data_format
column.comment: the data format for NetCDF, GRIB, and etc.

column.name: file_format
column.comment: the file format for tar or compress

column.name: checksum
column.comment: md5 checksum of web data file

column.name: locflag
column.comment: location flag: Glade, Object, and Both

column.name: type
column.comment: Data (default), dOcument or Software

column.name: status
column.comment: Public, Internal & Deleted

column.name: fileflag
column.comment: file flag: F-File, P-Path

column.name: gindex
column.comment: if > 0, under a subgroup in a dataset

column.name: tindex
column.comment: if > 0, under a top subgroup in a dataset

column.name: vindex
column.comment: if > 0, under a version control

column.name: disp_order
column.comment: display order of the files in a group

column.name: bid
column.comment: if > 0, point to backup file with bid

column.name: thredd_link
column.comment: Y to link to file Thredd catalog

column.name: meta_link
column.comment: Y to link to file level content meta data

column.name: note
column.comment: description of this file
